title: Kojima Death Stranding Follow Up Passed Up By Google Stadia?! - Kinda Funny Games Daily 09.30.22
description:
Learn more about the NZXT Canvas Gaming Monitors at http://nzxt.co/KINDAFUNNY

Go to http://www.kindafunny.com/uplift to Uplift your life with an Uplift Desk!

Google said no to Kojima on a Death Strandding sequel? God of War PC's studio is working on a flagship PlayStation IP? Tim and Blessing close out the week talking about all of it and more.

Time Stamps:
00:00:00 - Start
00:03:39 - Housekeeping
A new PS I Love You XOXO is up right now. Janet’s gotten to play Crisis Core Final Fantasy 7 Reunion along with some other Square games. That’s up on Youtube.com/kindafunnygames and podcast services.
The Roper Report   -
00:04:48 - Google Reportedly Passed on a Stadia-Exclusive Follow-Up to Death Stranding
00:19:41 - REQUIRED READING: Game Devs And Stadia Employees Alike Were Blindsided By The Sudden Shutdown - https://bit.ly/3UKcyfs
00:33:27 - God of War’s PC port studio says it’s working with Sony on a ‘flagship’ live service game
00:41:40 - Need For Speed Unbound Reveal “Imminent”
00:49:00 - Ubisoft announces playtest for new session-based co-op shooter ‘Project U’
00:51:18 - Out today
00:55:03 - Squad Up: SoulBlaster59 - PS4 - The Division 2
00:56:59 - You‘re Wrong
Next Week’s Hosts:
Monday: Greg and Bless
Tuesday: Greg and Bless
Wednesday: Bless and Greg
Thursday: Bless and Tim
Friday: Tim and Bless

Epic Creator Code: KindaFunny
